name: Survivor in Summer
description: Try to keep 3 people surviving the plane crash
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1 GB moderate display card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB moderate video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported
